ui
Class UI

java.lang.Object
  ui.UI
Direct Known Subclasses:
Dialog
public abstract class UI
extends java.lang.Object

A base class that all UserInterfaces must extend (Human <-> Computer communication) The UI will be constructed by a Core class, which will call the UI.start() command, when the core is ready for User interaction.

Author:
Morten SÃ¸rensen, Frederik Nordahl Sabroe, Niels Thykier
